comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm game. Want to meet at TCOM at 12:15?

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Greg, I'll check outside HUMN @ 12:15p to see if anyone's waiting here, then head over to TCOM @ 12:17p. Sound good?

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Bummer! Sorry I wasn't around to give you my patch kit. Hope you didn't miss any meetings. You're right, sure was a nice day for a flat, but two is a little much.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Luckily, my 1:30 meeting was moved back a week, so I was fine. I'll bet my cleats are a little worse for the wear, tho.
